title: I dont have a "Your Shop"?
body: So I cant seem to find this "Your shop" thing.. Is it concealed anywhere? I've looked under discounts in the store (which I hardly doubted I would find them) And indeed, they weren't there. Where is "My Shop" supposed to be?

replies.body: We were having a few issues with the personalized shop not working correctly, so it's been disabled for the time being. Make sure to check out the [**status page**](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#euw) for more updates on when it'll be reactivated!
Same here, I can't find it even as others are talking about theirs.
they disabled it because it was repeating skins and giving skins for champs you almost never play or champs you dont own.
